verses.verse: He heals the brokenhearted and binds up their wounds.
By His stripes, we are healed.
I am the Lord who heals you.
The prayer of faith will save the sick, and the Lord will raise them up.
He sent His word and healed them.
Your faith has made you well.
He forgives all your sins and heals all your diseases.
I will restore health to you and heal your wounds.
Jesus went about healing every disease.
The Sun of Righteousness shall arise with healing in His wings.
Is anyone among you sick? Let them call the elders to pray.
My God shall supply all your needs.
You shall serve the Lord your God, and He will bless your bread and your water, and I will take sickness away from you.
The Lord sustains them on their sickbed and restores them.
Heal me, O Lord, and I shall be healed.
No weapon formed against you shall prosper.
The Lord is close to the brokenhearted.
I will give you rest.
Do not fear, for I am with you.
A cheerful heart is good medicine.
God will wipe away every tear.
The Lord is my strength and my shield.
Those who hope in the Lord will renew their strength.
Peace I leave with you; My peace I give to you.
Cast all your anxiety on Him because He cares for you.
The Lord is my shepherd; I shall not want.
He restores my soul.
You will keep in perfect peace those whose minds are steadfast.
Come to Me, all who are weary, and I will give you rest.
The Lord will fight for you; you need only to be still.
I can do all things through Christ who strengthens me.
Do not be anxious about anything, but in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.
The Lord is my light and my salvation—whom shall I fear?
Trust in the Lord with all your heart and lean not on your own understanding.
The Lord is good, a refuge in times of trouble.
Be strong and courageous. Do not be afraid; do not be discouraged, for the Lord your God will be with you wherever you go.
The Lord is my rock, my fortress and my deliverer.
For God has not given us a spirit of fear, but of power and of love and of a sound mind.
The Lord is my strength and my song; He has become my salvation.
But the Lord is faithful, and He will strengthen you and protect you from the evil one.
The Lord is near to all who call on Him.
The name of the Lord is a strong tower; the righteous run to it and are safe.
He gives strength to the weary and increases the power of the weak.
The Lord upholds all who fall and lifts up all who are bowed down.
But You, Lord, are a shield around me, my glory, the One who lifts my head high.
The Lord is my strength and my defense; He has become my salvation.
The Lord is my shepherd, I lack nothing.
The Lord is close to the brokenhearted and saves those who are crushed in spirit.
Cast your cares on the Lord and He will sustain you; He will never let the righteous be shaken.
The Lord is good, a stronghold in the day of trouble; He knows those who take refuge in Him.
But the Lord is faithful. He will establish you and guard you against the evil one.
The Lord is my light and my salvation—whom shall I fear? The Lord is the stronghold of my life—of whom shall I be afraid?
The Lord is my rock, my fortress and my deliverer; my God is my rock, in whom I take refuge, my shield and the horn of my salvation, my stronghold.
The Lord is my strength and my song; He has become my salvation.
The Lord is near to all who call on Him, to all who call on Him in truth.
The name of the Lord is a strong tower; the righteous run to it and are safe.
He gives strength to the weary and increases the power of the weak.
The Lord upholds all who fall and lifts up all who are bowed down.
But You, Lord, are a shield around me, my glory, the One who lifts my head high.
The Lord is my strength and my defense; He has become my salvation.
The Lord is my shepherd, I lack nothing.
The Lord is close to the brokenhearted and saves those who are crushed in spirit.

The Lord is good, a stronghold in the day of trouble; He knows those who take refuge in Him.
But the Lord is faithful. He will establish you and guard you against the evil one.
